notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was supported by MULTIFOREVER granted to UE; Project MULTIFOREVER is supported under the umbrella of ERA-NET Cofund ForestValue by ANR (FR), FNR (DE), MINCyT (AR), MINECO-AEI (ES), MMM (FI) and VINNOVA (SE). ForestValue has received funding from the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme under grant agreement NÂ°773324. Open Access funding provided by Swedish University of Agricultural Sciences.
